articles.title: Civil engineers examine urban cooling strategies using reflective surfaces - Science Daily
articles.description: Researchers used a Computational Fluid Dynamics model to find ways to decrease cost and increase usage of cooler surfaces. The paper examined the possibility of applying cooler surfaces to just half the surfaces in a city.
